thread.title: Solange Knowles May Have Outdressed Her Sister, Beyoncé, at the Grammys

author: Marina Liao
title: Solange Knowles May Have Outdressed Her Sister, Beyoncé, at the Grammys
text: Solange Knowles's Gold Dress at the Grammys 2017 Solange Knowles May Have Outdressed Her Sister, Beyoncé, at the Grammys February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Solange Knowles May Have Outdressed Her Sister, Beyoncé, at the Grammys While we're excited to see what Beyoncé will wear to the Grammys, we're already enamored by her sister's outfit. Solange Knowles stepped onto the red carpet in a pleated metallic gown, looking every bit like a golden goddess. The structural silhouette reminded us of several dresses we saw on the Fall 2017 runways , which proves when it comes to fashion, Solange is already ahead of the trend. Luck seems to be on her side, too. The singer won her first Grammy of the night for best R&B performance for "Cranes in the Sky," and now, she has our vote for best dressed of the night.
